Package cs310datastructures

Class Book

java.lang.Object
cs310datastructures.ShelfItem
cs310datastructures.Book
public class Book extends ShelfItem
A class representing a basic book object. (Class complete, do not modify!)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Book()
    The default constructor
    Book(String bookTitle, String bookAuthor, int numberPages, int timesRead)
    A constructor that allows creating a book with a title, bookAuthor, the number of pages in the book, and the number of times the book has been read

    • Book

      public Book(String bookTitle, String bookAuthor, int numberPages, int timesRead)
      A constructor that allows creating a book with a title, bookAuthor, the number of pages in the book, and the number of times the book has been read
      Parameters:
      bookTitle - the title of the book
      bookAuthor - the bookAuthor of the book
      numberPages - the number of pages in the book
      timesRead - the number of times the book has been read

      public void increaseTimesRead()
      Increases the number of times a book has been read by one.

    • decreaseTimesRead

      public void decreaseTimesRead()
      Decreases the number of times a book has been read. This value will never be less than zero.

    • enterItem

      public void enterItem(Scanner input)
      Allow a user to enter the information for a book.
      Specified by:
      enterItem in class ShelfItem
      Parameters:
      input - the scanner object used for input

    • enterBookTitle

      public void enterBookTitle(Scanner input)
      Allows a user to enter the book title information. Ensures that the title entered is not the empty string.
      Parameters:
      input - the scanner object used for input

    • enterBookAuthor

      public void enterBookAuthor(Scanner input)
      Allows a user to enter the book author information. Ensures that the author entered is not the empty string.
      Parameters:
      input - the scanner object used for input

    • enterNumberPages

      public void enterNumberPages(Scanner input)
      Allows a user to enter the number of pages in the book. Ensures that the number of pages is a positive integer value.
      Parameters:
      input - the scanner object used for input

    • enterTimesRead

      public void enterTimesRead(Scanner input)
      Allows a user to enter the number of times a book has been read. Ensures that the number of pages is a positive integer value.
      Parameters:
      input - the scanner object used for input

    • displayItem

      public void displayItem()
      Displays information for a book to standard output.
      Specified by:
      displayItem in class ShelfItem

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts a book object into a string representation. The format of the string is BOOK: BookTitle by BookAuthor
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a reference to a string representing a book
